field.name: image_filer_category
field.placeholder: Enter any category name to filter

span.title: A unique reference number generated by Aqary CRM. The first two letters denote the Unit Type (WH=Warehouse; LC=Labor Camp; RE=Retail; OF=Office; CV=Commercial Villa; CP=Commercial Plot; MP=Mixed Use Plot).

A unique reference number generated by Aqaryc CRM. The first two letters denote the Unit Type (WH=Warehouse; LC=Labor Camp; RE=Retail; OF=Office; CV=Commercial Villa; CP=Commercial Plot; MP=Mixed Use Plot).
Name of the agent who referred this Unit and shares the commission. This information can be used in the Accounts module to allocate internal referral payments.
Tick-mark this to send the Unit for your Manager's approval (applicable only if Draft functionality is being used). Make sure to update at least 6 images and 1 floor plan.
The location of the key. It is important to keep this information updated to allow agents to show the Unit.
Number of keys given to the tenant
The percentage that will be used to calculate internal referral commission for the Internal Referral Agent.
